Andrea Carr <ACARR3@...> wrote:              Amy,
  
  Do you know how to smudge? It�s easy even incense will do for that and clear out the energy around you. I have been finding recently that I have had to increase how often I do it. I had to do it a couple times this week and it took care of things that had been going on around me.
  
  Andrea

    There is a scratch on my arm that was not there last night/ yesterday etc. I was sending out some emails and my arm hurt <right underside> and there is  about a 3 inch scratch there. And i couldnt scratch myself in my sleep cause i have NO nails! LOL i chew my nails <TMI> lol
